sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const Cart = () => { const [items, setItems] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Sample Product", price: 10, quantity: 1, image: "/api/placeholder/80/80" }, { id: 2, name: "Sample Product 2", price: 20, quantity: 1, image: "/api/placeholder/80/80" }, { id: 3, name: "Sample Product 3", price: 30, quantity: 1, image: "/api/placeholder/80/80" } ]); const updateQuantity = (id, change) => { setItems(items.map(item => item.id === id ? { ...item, quantity: Math.max(1, item.quantity + change) } : item )); }; const removeItem = (id) => { setItems(items.filter(item => item.id !== id)); }; const calculateTotal = () => { return items.reduce((total, item) => total + (item.price * item.quantity), 0); }; return (

Your Shopping Cart

There are {items.length} products in your cart.

{items.length > 0 ? (
{items.map((item) => ( ))}
Product Price Quantity Total Action
{item.name}
${item.price.toFixed(2)}
{item.quantity}
${(item.price * item.quantity).toFixed(2)}

Order Summary

Subtotal ${calculateTotal().toFixed(2)}
Shipping Free
Total ${calculateTotal().toFixed(2)}
) : (

Your cart is empty.

)}
); }; export default Cart;
